Title: Drupal core Remote Code Execution
Description: In Drupal core, when sending email some variables were not being sanitized for shell arguments in `DefaultMailSystem::mail()`, which could lead to remote code execution.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 7.0 before 7.60, all versions starting from 8.0.0 before 8.5.8, all versions starting from 8.6.0 before 8.6.2
NotImpacted: All versions before 7.0, all versions starting from 7.60 before 8.0.0, all versions starting from 8.5.8 before 8.6.0, all versions starting from 8.6.2
